movies.title: Cinderella Man
movies.plot: The true story of boxer Jim Braddock who, in the 1920â€™s following his retirement, makes a surprise comeback in order to get him and his family out of a socially poor state.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 42 nominations.
